author: TÃ¼nde G
title: Afternoon Tea
text: I had an Afternoon Tea with my very good friend. Thanks for the chefs the beautifully presented cakes selection and very delicious food, for Juan and Emilio the excellent service. We were looked after very well. Special thanks for Scott, we had the opportuniy to listen his singing. It was absolutely amazing. We were very pleased. Highly recommended!
